info.title: PagerDuty
info.description: PagerDuty is an agile incident management platform that integrates with IT Ops and DevOps monitoring stacks to improve operational reliability and agility for organizations.

x-ms-docs.description: Decrease incident resolution times with PagerDuty and Microsoft Flow

get.description: Retrieves incident object by incident key.
Retrieves the user's information for a given ID.

get.summary: Get all the notes for an incident
get.description: Get all the notes for an incident

post.description: Add note to a given incident.

put.description: Mark a given incident as resolved.

post.description: Snooze a given incident by a certain time.

put.description: Use a given escalation policy on an incident.

get.description: Retrieves incident object by incident key.
Triggers when a note is added to the given incident.
